name: Not a fishing game
description:
A casual mobile game about helping fishes not getting fished ! I might release it to the google play store some day, but meanwhile here it is ! You will need an android phone (or tablet, but i'll be honest I don't have one so I haven't tested it, so I can't really tell you if it will work well haha !). There are only 10 levels for now, but tell me if you like it and i will add more !

Thanks for playing, i hope you like it !
